markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Goblin Scuttle](/Feats.aspx?ID=4441) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 56 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Trigger**
An ally ends a move action adjacent to you

</column>

---

You take advantage of your ally's movement to adjust your position. You [Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=87).

<title level="2">Goblin Scuttle leads to...</title>
[Skittering Scuttle](/Feats.aspx?ID=4452)
name: Goblin Scuttle
